matches: Value does not match what was expected
isLowercase: May contain lower case characters only
isUppercase: May contain upper case characters only
isLength: Must be at least %s in length
isIn: Must equal one of the following: %s
notIn: Must not equal any of the following:  %s
min: Number must be greater than or equal to %s
max: Number must be less than or equal to %s
minLen: Expected a string of at least %s character(s)
maxLen: Expected a string of no more than %s character(s)
precision: Expected a decimal with a maximum precision of %s
